title: Tech Trade Group Sues California to Halt Children’s Online Safety Law
description: NetChoice, whose members include Amazon, Google, Meta and TikTok, said the new law could cause online services to limit important content for minors.

title: Twitter Suspends Over 25 Accounts That Track Billionaires’ Private Planes
description: The suspended accounts include one that followed the private plane of Elon Musk, Twitter’s owner.

title: Twitter Suspends Over 25 Accounts That Track Billionaires’ Private Planes
description: The suspended accounts include one that followed the private plane of Elon Musk, Twitter’s owner.

title: How to Use Parental Controls on Your Child’s New Phone
description: Apple and Google have upgraded their built-in software for managing the mobile experience, but you have many options for digital supervision.

title: Are Mushrooms the Future of Alternative Leather?
description: MycoWorks uses mycelium, the substance in the root structure of mushrooms, to make Reishi, which has the look and feel of leather. Big-name companies are very interested.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX Engaged in Fraud for Years, Prosecutors Say
description: A criminal indictment unsealed on Tuesday and a complaint by the S.E.C. describe years of wrongdoing in Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto empire.
